title: a rich guy opened a WOW server and paid people to play with him - insane story..
body: apparently this guy in Africa wanted to play WOW but he felt like missed out, because the game is old now. he wanted to play the game and feel what it's like to play through each patch from the very start. so he started to pay people to play with him, he found like 1k random people online, and each month he added a patch to the game. he even made sure that people know they need to form clans and fight each other, he accepted everything ingame, but cheating.
